citation: Proclamation under the Youth Justice Act 1997 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Youth Justice Act 1997

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Youth Justice Act 1997 fix 1 February 2000 as the day on which that Act commences.

22 December 1999

G. S. M. GREEN

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

JUDY JACKSON

Minister for Health and Human Services

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 29 December 1999

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Health and Human Services.
